string-array.name: inspirational_quotes
string-array.item: “It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.”_Confucius
“You are greater than your addiction.”_Nasia Davos
“I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.”_Michael Jordan
“Quitting smoking is rather a marathon than a sprint. It is not a one-time attempt, but a longer effort.”_Aristotle
“Thousands of people stop smoking a day – by dying from it. I simply wish you won’t be one of them.”_Anonymous
“Your craving is temporary, but the damage to your lungs is permanent.”_Anonymous
“Work like there is someone working twenty four hours a day to take it away from you.”_Mark Cuban
“Invest in your dreams. Grind now. Shine later.”_Unknown
“If you hear a voice within you say ‘you cannot paint,’ then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.”_Vincent Van Gogh
